A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Amazing acting\, visuals\, and action. The expectations whiplash from Force Awakens to Last Jedi was frustrating\, but forgivable. Guess it's my fault for going down the fan-theory rabbit hole. However\, Poe Dameron getting a wrist slap for mutiny AND effectively getting 300+ resistance fighters and crew killed with his plan is a big oversight and kind of abusive to his character. I don't think this movie deserves all the hate\, but I don't think it deserves all of the hype either. It's a solid C+.
